artist_name: Ariana and the Rose Kevin Drew Remix
metrics_conclusion: In Your Bed has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
In Your Bed is written in the key of C Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Minor keys and     the 9th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (C minor, F minor, and G minor).

See the C Minor Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
